website_summaries.verdict: The all-natural formula is vegan and free of hormones, preservatives, soy, and gluten.
pros: 100% all-natural formula, with 95% standardized curcuminoids and bioperine for improved absorption
Vegan and free of gluten, dairy, hormones, preservatives, and soy
Many felt this worked well to reduce pain
cons: Some experienced a turmeric aftertaste, as well as side effects such as stomach burning and diarrhea
Capsules are a little large and may be hard to swallow

customer_reviews.title: Works On my Osteoarthritis
customer_reviews.text: Suffer from Osteoarthritis in my lower back especially at night. I was popping Advils & Tylenols every night before bedtime. I first tried Turmeric with ginger and that upset my stomach and gave me diarrhea. but so far after about 2 weeks I'm getting real relief at night so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I waited until I finished the whole first bottle, before the review and I much say I love this product.I have arthritis and severe neck pain due to tension in my neck. After the first day or two, i noticed my neck pain was gone. Also other pains in my body had significantly subsided. However, I took 2 pills the recommend dosage right away and I got a major headache and this kept happening, so I decreased the dosage to 1 pill a day is all my body can handle. Also, this stuff really regulates the body, if you know what i mean. When that happens,you can loose weight, i did. I will purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: cherie l.

customer_reviews.title: Its worth a try for painful joints
customer_reviews.text: This herbal med has given me a lot of relief from my arthritis as advertised. I began getting relief after about 10 days. My hands are still stiff in the morning, but no pain. No knee pain (or stiffness) any longer. My arthritis in the past was pretty painful, especially in the mornings and in cold weather. As a side note, I paid for (and continue to do so) this supplement, this is not a "paid" endorsement; I get a bottle monthly via my Amazon Subscribe and Save.
customer_reviews.author: Gheadsr

customer_reviews.title: It really does work.
customer_reviews.text: You know how you try a product and can't tell if it's really doing something or you're just wishing it would? Well I think this really does work! I'm at the end of a typical ugly January and haven't had a single crying jag which is almost unheard of. I can get out of a sitting position and start walking without a long pause because of pain and basically just have a better sense of well being physically and emotionally. And here I thought my best days were behind me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bingham

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for arthritic joint pain!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product specifically for arthritic joint pain relief. I used it for three months on the subscription plan and found that it did not help at all with my joint pain. As a matter of fact my pain increased, and moved to different joints. So for me this product did not work for my arthritis pain. I have canceled my subscription! Good luck to others who might use this product for joint pain.
customer_reviews.author: Book Finders

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive facts - these are LOW DOSE pills!
customer_reviews.text: This product contains 100mg of Turmeric Curcumin per dosage STANDARDIZED, which means 50mg per pill. The 1200 number (NOT STANDARDIZED) is very deceptive and worthless when comparing products. The Amazon brand of this pill, for example, contains 400mg per pill STANDARDIZED. The Amazon pill therefore contains 8x the amount of Curmucin as this one - for the same price. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: One Wolf

customer_reviews.title: This has got me back to running!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot speak more highly about this product! I started running almost 2 years ago, and it did get to my knees. It became so painful, and PT was not helping what I found out was osteoarthritis. I began taking this, not feeling hopeful at all, but within a few days, I noticed I could walk down stairs with no problem... tried other things in the past, but this has truly made a difference to me! I have since completed a Ragnar relay with no problems, which was huge! Make sure you check out any drug interactions, as turmeric can lower blood sugar as well as it thins blood...
customer_reviews.author: nomadheart

customer_reviews.title: Big Capsule!
customer_reviews.text: The capsules are big and very difficult to swallow. They are almost an inch long and a qtr. inch wide. I posted a picture.
customer_reviews.author: SC62

customer_reviews.title: Poor choice in brand for Turmeric/Curcumin
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied with this product! It gave me so much gas and stomach discomfort! I've taken other brands of turmeric and never had an issue like I did with this one! I eliminated this product and continued taking other supplements without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Mudge

customer_reviews.title: Extract and not a concentrate - HUGE difference
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after taking a concentrated tumeric and felt the difference in just hours. This stuff is not even comparable to a concentrated tumeric capsule. Extract is heated at high temperatures, or using alcohol, essentially killing the herb. Concentrate uses water to produce the herb, removing it from the water, so it does not lose any of its nutrients. Look for a concentrated tumeric, not extract! Then you will see the difference if you think this stuff is good.
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: No Relief for Me :(
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I did not enjoy any relief at all ... I was so hopeful because living with this arthritic pain is close to devastating. I am glad so many others are experiencing relief. I took entire contents of bottle faithfully for 1 month and did not skip a beat.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Please Research Side Effects Before Buying
customer_reviews.text: I completely believe all of the positive reviews on here, but make sure you're researching possible side effects before purchasing for yourself. For me, I guess the dosage must have been too high/potent with 2 capsules/daily because I started feeling extremely dizzy and nauseated at random. It also severely messed with my menstrual cycle, causing it to start early and be much heavier than normal. These negative effects started after just a week of use, and I didn't figure it out until week 2. It took about exactly 2 weeks for the lightheadedness and confusion to completely subside.
customer_reviews.author: Caren

customer_reviews.title: My "patient" is bed/wheelchair bound, very little muscle mass ...
customer_reviews.text: My "patient" is bed/wheelchair bound, very little muscle mass, constantly complaining of back pain, and others aches from various surgeries to repair broken hips, ankle, and collarbone. She also has intermittent bouts of fibromyalgia. Since putting her on a 2 a day regimen of this supplement, her complaints have reduced by 80-90 %, and her consumption of ibuprofen by 95%. It has eased her suffering immensely and I am so grateful.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Winter

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad product but I'd like to cancel the auto ship ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product but I'd like to cancel the auto ship and there's no way I can find to do so.
customer_reviews.author: KELLY KIRKPATRICK

customer_reviews.title: Superb Product
customer_reviews.text: As an arthritis sufferer for many years depending on Ansaids all day every day and subsequently undergoing a total knee replacement in December I began taking Tumeric Curcumin post surgery. I have totally discontinued all other otc meds for pain relief. I now take 2 capsues in the morning and that is all I need for discomfort and stiffness not to mention other added health benefits of this supplement.
customer_reviews.author: P. Davison

customer_reviews.title: Does have side effects
customer_reviews.text: I was very enthusiastic when I saw this product. I love Turmeric, however I took them as instructed, two capsules with a meal. Holy moly I got supper dizzy and nauseous. My blood pleasure dropped and I couldn’t sleep. I have no idea why I had this reaction, I don’t take any medication whatsoever. I bought these for back pain. Well it did help some what. However, the side effects were more than I could handle.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmine

customer_reviews.title: Works to reduce joint inflamation and will reduce high pertension ...
customer_reviews.text: Works to reduce joint inflamation and will reduce hypertension with prolonged use. I find it extremely effective. Side effect: heartburn if not taken with food.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Product Description/ Different color
customer_reviews.text: Pills are a different color than last time (like others' reviews). Product bottle also now states it has rice flour in it. Returning. GARBAGE. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: I kept reading about the amazing results people were having with turmeric to relieve inflammation
customer_reviews.text: I kept reading about the amazing results people were having with turmeric to relieve inflammation, so I thought I would try it. I'm amazed that I'm no longer having to take over the counter medication. This worked wonders for me. When I told my internal medicine physician I was taking it she shockingly asked Why? The medical profession in light years behind curing people naturally. Or perhaps the pharmaceutical companies give them too many rewards for prescribing drugs. Try it for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Pick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My torn of meniscus is 100% better. It helps antiinflamation! I am Very happy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Harumi Mankarios

customer_reviews.title: Changed fillers
customer_reviews.text: First time I brought this it was great. I have many allergies to fillers and had no issues. They changed their anti caking agent from rice flour to mircocrystaline cellulose and boom I had a bad reaction. Called company and they told me NO we did not change the formula! No explaining helped them to understand. Will not use them again
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Upset my syomach so bad had to stop is using....not for me
customer_reviews.author: dluv

customer_reviews.title: Takes a couple of weeks to build up in ur sys
customer_reviews.text: It took a couple weeks to build up in my system. But once it was awwwww sweet relief from arthritis and bursitis pain.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Solomon

customer_reviews.title: these supplements have taken away our pups limp!!! !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our beautiful little puppy pups are sooo very much in love with playing ball... but the pup pup on the right has a bad case of arthritis in her hip, so her Accupuncturist recommends that she takes turmeric daily. Since starting turmeric, she has stopped limping in the morning!!! She is happily playing ball with her sister every chance that she gets!!! Great supplement for puppy pups 👍
customer_reviews.author: Tina M.

customer_reviews.title: I am allergic to this supplement
customer_reviews.text: I am allergic to this product therefore I do not want to order it once a month so could you please take me off the monthly list thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works, and it's natural! No more toxic pharmaceuticals
customer_reviews.text: I already had arthritis in my fingers, but also started having it in my feet. Swollen, painful toes made it very uncomfortable to walk. I was already taking Celebrex and it didn't help this new issue, so I decided to explore natural remedies. This product works! I'm not off Celebrex (YEAH) and feeling good. I've already ordered my next bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Thane

customer_reviews.title: The Vet Said She Takes It Too
customer_reviews.text: I have a big old red dog who still, at age 12, makes my heart smile. So when he started limping with arthritis, I took him to our vet, a little concerned because he takes several meds and I dreaded adding something else to talk him into. No problem: the doctor told me to buy turmeric (vitamin size, not the little bottle of the spice) and put it in his food once a day. IT WORKS! I pull the capsules apart and just mix it into his chow. He doesn't mind the taste at all -- and I enjoy the smell myself. Best of all, Morgan feels much better. GOOD WORK, TURMERIC!
customer_reviews.author: k.d.

customer_reviews.title: Anti-inflammation
customer_reviews.text: I was taking diclofenac for L5 S1 aka (sciatica) surgery all setup to go. Diclofenac is hard on the kidneys, l started taking Turmeric Curcumin the sciatica went away. This is the first, no snake oil l been off Diclofenac over a week l am calling the surgery off.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger D Sharp

customer_reviews.title: easing the pain....
customer_reviews.text: This product is being used, along with "Instaflex" for PMR, (polymyaglia rheumatica). Used in conjunction with changes to diet; less red meat, avoiding wheat products/wheat byproducts whenever possible, and finally adding antioxidant rich fruit juices & veggies.... it's working!
customer_reviews.author: Eggs4me

customer_reviews.title: A Great Anti-Inflammatory
customer_reviews.text: Within one week of starting this supplement (Turmeric Curcumin), I was able to stop taking a daily Aleve (for rib inflammation) for the first time in decades. My doctor says it may not work for everyone but it certainly works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: This supplement is a life saver for someone like me who can not take the ocean sourced joint ...
customer_reviews.text: This supplement is a life saver for someone like me who can not take the ocean sourced joint compounds. I am allergic to those oceanic ingredients, anaphylactic to shellfish and seafood. Before I took Tumeric Curcumin my hands hurt all the time, I sew and I am not about to give that lifelong skill up. This supplement means NO PAIN in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: weshophere

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: Within just a few days, this product mastered my severe arthritis pain. What I love about it is that it does not interact with my other medications nor do I have any side effects. It works better than anything I have ever used including my prescription anti-inflammatory which I no longer need to take. I take mine in two doses following breakfast and dinner. This is a wonderful medicine!
customer_reviews.author: A. Blackmon

customer_reviews.title: Significant reduction in my osteoarthritis stiffness and pain
customer_reviews.text: Within a week of starting to take this regularly twice per day (I was mistakenly only taking once a day at first), my hand stiffness caused by osteoarthritis reduced dramatically. Curcumin was recommended by my rheumatologist as a preferred option to NSAIDs, with equal effectiveness but less side effects. I'm totally a convert! This is a high quality product with 95% curcuminoids and pepper extract included, so I'll definitely keep ordering this brand (already have my second bottle ready!).
customer_reviews.author: J. Noah

customer_reviews.title: Too bad I did not start with these guys
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd brand of turmeric I've tried from Amazon. The first brand stopped working after a short time and the second brand did not seem to do much of anything. This is the only brand that really works for me. Although I'm not sure of the difference, the results in my back pain and diabetic neuropathy are real. Too bad I did not start with these guys. I've told other people of this brand name. No one can believe I'm that improved. 5 stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Chris from CT

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for  me
customer_reviews.text: Been taking it a few weeks and havent really noticed any improvement with my back pain
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Mariani

customer_reviews.title: I started taking Turmeric Curcumin about five months ago. ...
customer_reviews.text: I started taking Turmeric Curcumin about five months ago. It has taken awhile, but I really feel improvement in my joints. In fact, the pain in my joints has been reduced quite a bit. I have no intentions of discontinuing this product. I'm sold on its results!
customer_reviews.author: lp

customer_reviews.title: LEAD-FREE !!!
customer_reviews.text: I had asked Vimerson Health if their product was "Lead-free" and they assured me that it was.. I was concerned because India is one of the sources that Turmeric comes from (can't remember the other countries) and I had read that Lead was commonly found in varying strengths in a lot of turmeric supplements..
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well, easy to swallow, can sometimes smell the tumeric/pepper through the capsule
customer_reviews.text: Like this brand. I go to the gym 5-6 days a week and lift heavy. This helps with inflammation if I overdo something. I also take it when I've eaten food with lots of oil or cream, sometimes it feels like this helps counter that (the 'opposite' consistency and kind of breaks it up/evens it out in the gut).
customer_reviews.author: E. Sander

customer_reviews.title: It has microcrystalline cellulose filler!:(
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving 2 stars because it has microcrystalline cellulose which is a filler that is not healthy. If I'm going to buy something for my health then I would like it to not have unhealthy fillers and other junk.
customer_reviews.author: Kala

customer_reviews.title: Let the buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these because of the smaller size and because of having pepper. What I found out after is that it's the amount of "Standardized to minimum 95% Curcuminoids" that matters for health purposes. This brand has 1200 mg of the "root", but only 100 mg of the Standardized to minimum 95% Curcuminoids. The NOW brand has 663 mg of root and 630 mg of Standardized to minimum 95% Curcuminoids! Better bang for your bucks!
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Worse side effects than prescription nsaids
customer_reviews.text: Tried this to reduce nsaid use, actually caused more bleeding issues than the nsaids. Had no idea that could be a side effect of turmeric until I did more digging. So beware if your are prone to bleeding issues from nsaid use!
customer_reviews.author: R S

customer_reviews.title: No change
customer_reviews.text: I felt no difference after taking all of them. I took recommend dosage, guess my RA is just to strong for this to make a difference. They did not seem to help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Dinkins

customer_reviews.title: I feek so much better!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product now for over 2 months. I can't believe the difference it is making in my daily life. I have sometimes chronic pain in my joints and just randomly in my arms. Since I started taking this supplement, I have noticed a HUGE difference. No random pain, and also my joint pain and movement is remarkably better! I also notice a difference in feeling less bloated. I will most definitely continue with this supplement as long as I continue feeling the benefits!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: she was given only a few months to live and started taking loads of Tumeric and now she's feeling the best she ever has
customer_reviews.text: An older woman told me this long story about this being a cure-all, she was given only a few months to live and started taking loads of Tumeric and now she's feeling the best she ever has. I have been on it for nearly a year now, and I definitely notice a difference in my muscles and joints when I do take it vs when I forget. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: CAME WITH ER VISIT!
customer_reviews.text: Day #1- stomach upset, bloating, loss of appetite. No inflammation relief. (Thought it could've been a virus, it didn't register) Day #2- stomach upset, bloating, tightness in chest, chest pain, heart palpitations, neck swelling. By evening had to go to ER. Day #3- writing crap review, diarrhea. Trying to return these. Never had a reaction to turmeric before. Buyer beware. Something is shady.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Bee

customer_reviews.title: Took for 1 month daily. Did not help with ...
customer_reviews.text: Took for 1 month daily. Did not help with the pain in my hip joints or feet. Was very hopeful after reading other reviews. Wished it had worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps with joint pain.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this for a week and have found it to be most helpful in relieving joint pain. I have had a "mystery pain" in my ankle on and off for years that I am convinced is arthritis. Yesterday I realized that ankle has not hurt me once this week, even though I have been on my feet a great deal. Have had a little intestinal disturbance but can't determine if it is this product or an over-consumption of fruit. At this point, I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lee Greenmeadow

customer_reviews.title: Feel it's impact almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because i heard it helped with inflammation. I was having significant range of motion/pain in my shoulders. Seriously within one day, I could feel a notable difference! I have tried other brands, but keep coming back to this one.
customer_reviews.author: H. Spears

customer_reviews.title: Great for my knee joint
customer_reviews.text: I am 70 years old and an avid hiker and have been having issues with my right knee. I feel like I am having almost zero pain when I descend down the mountain trails since I started taking this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tesgeb

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Alternative to Harmful Medications
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this along with gingeroot as an alternative to taking doclofenic or Voltaren ( a NSAID) for an unknown antiflamatory issue. After taking 2 entire bottles, I can confidently say that this, along with the ginger root tablets have proven to work just as well with controlling the pain and inflammation. Would definitely purchase again .
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: So thankful!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Turmeric Curcumin with Bioperine for many months now with great success. I have had many difficulties with itchy skin on my lower legs (undiagnosable by dermatologist) that has made me nearly suicidal. I decided to try your product. It took a few weeks of using & toying with the dosage (I now take 4 pills a day at lunch) to find a good result for me, but I am doing MUCH better now.
customer_reviews.author: KAW

customer_reviews.title: I should have read the reviews
customer_reviews.text: I shouldn’t have trusted the rating. First, I don’t know who can swallow these giant horse pills, but I know I cannot. Second, i think by making them so big we won’t notice that the amount of 95% standardized curcuminoids per giant pill is only 50 mg. The pills i currently take are much smaller and contain 500 mg per pill! The 95% standardized curcuminoids is the proper way to compare strength, root extract is too variable. So read the label, get a product with high amounts per pill of 95% standardized curcuminoids and forget these giant pills.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Better sleep, mental focus, and less joint pain
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are both taking this. We are sleeping better, less joint pain and our minds seem more focused. We definitely noticed over all health improvements. We are 55 and 58 years old, so we will take what we can get. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Connie Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Must be working
customer_reviews.text: I have diagnosed “tennis elbow”. I have had physical therapy and it did help. but I did continue to have some pain when reaching and lifting. If I try to lift something out of my refrigerator with my left arm, there is pain. I had this product for about 3 weeks. I noticed yesterday when I went to lift a container out of my refrigerator I experienced no discomfort. I usually switch hands or bring my left elbow close to my body and then lift. Today I reached for something in the refrigerator. Again I felt no discomfort. This must be working. I will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Rooks

customer_reviews.title: ... use this product regularly because I’ve heard about the amazing health benefits of turmeric curcumin
customer_reviews.text: I use this product regularly because I’ve heard about the amazing health benefits of turmeric curcumin. I’m healthy and fit and I’m hoping it’s helping to keep me healthy over all. On that note, I don't notice any improvements with my knee pain. I have always been very active and several years ago developed patella femoral syndrome and stage 3 osteoarthritis in both knees causing pain and inflammation in my knees. Unfortunately it hasn’t helped at all with those issues. However, I do plan to continue taking it, I’m sure it’s contributing to my health overall.
customer_reviews.author: olgac3

customer_reviews.title: Look! Over there!
customer_reviews.text: Since taking this I have enjoyed Super Human strength and stamina. I now can leap tall buildings in a single bound and I am more powerful than a locomotive. Or at least my four year old thinks as much. This does make post-workout joint pain a thing of the past but only after 30-45 days of constant use. Like any natural remedy it is about getting it into your bloodstream and let it start to work. I will continue to buy and use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Greg D.

customer_reviews.title: that wasn't a good thing. I didn't want to take aspirin every ...
customer_reviews.text: I had been having pain in my right shoulder for months and being right-handed, that wasn't a good thing. I didn't want to take aspirin every day to be able to function, so I looked into Relief Factor but I didn't like the fact you had to sign up for a monthly supply. So I noticed that Amazon had pain relief products so I decided to get Turmeric Curcumin. This was the best decision that I could have made. It took a few days before I noticed a difference, but it was a miracle cure. Thank you Vimerson.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from chronic migraines and took medicine daily. Since taking this product my migraines have subsided! I feel healthier in so many aspects. I've even lost 15 lbs, had less flair up with my rosacea and had less pain during my menstrual cycle. I've tried so many pharmaceutical products and have been to so many doctors. I want to thank you for creating a product that has benefited me in so many ways.
customer_reviews.author: aubrie lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered 3 more on a flash deal...have been using another product for joint inflammation and seemed to make some areas not feel as good. Since switching to Vimerson Health Tumeric Curcumin these other areas feel just as good as the rest of the joint structure.
customer_reviews.author: jim odellTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: But I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: The first day I took the Turmeric Curcumin pills it worked for me. Relief of pain in my fingers and hands. Now I let my brother and brother in law a few pills to try and it did not work. From my understanding it may not work for all. But I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth G. Sauer

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: I think that I need to take this a little longer for the pain relief benefits. I'm still on my first bottle right now. The pills are easy to swallow, with no aftertaste or odor. My only issue has been that my stomach feels a little irritated if I use this product with a light meal or snack. I have to take it with a whole meal. So far, so good. I've been meaning to implement turmeric into my diet for a couple of years. This product got me off to an excellent start, I will be back to order.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Really helps!
customer_reviews.text: Turmeric Curcumin with Bioperine has helped alleviate post-workout muscle soreness, as well as general aches and pains that accumulate with strenuous activity. I've been pleased with how quickly the product seems to work, too. My best example is plantar fascitis, and within an hour or so of taking one or two capsules, the ache is no longer noticeable. I generally take a capsule the morning after a workout (HIIT) and notice no discomfort during the day when I would experience that soreness.
customer_reviews.author: C VandeVoorde

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Have been buying for a time and I like this brand. Recommend. I don’t take this for pain relief but gave it a five stars for that because I don’t have pain. I take turmeric because I used to give turmeric to my mom who had cancer and it helped along w b12. It’s a good anti-inflammatory so I take daily. I tried another brand because of the price to be honest but do not like those so will be buying these again once that bottle is gone. It’s best to just go w what works and feels right even if the price is a bit higher than the other “bargain” deals. Will stick to these
customer_reviews.author: Naya

customer_reviews.title: Bittersweet!
customer_reviews.text: Please do better guys.I really like the product,but this has happen more than once with me ordering the exact same product and the color of the pills are slightly different from the previous order.Which obviously leads me to believe it's not the same supplements.
customer_reviews.author: John Stansberry

customer_reviews.title: I’ll never be without it!!
customer_reviews.text: I had fluid on my knee resulting in pain so bad I was limping and could barely bend my knee. I had no insurance so I researched and learned about all the health/anti-inflammatory properties of turmeric. I ordered this brand and it has made all the difference!! In a couple of weeks I regained mobility and pain was reduced. In a month I was almost back to my old self. I can definitely tell if I stop taking it. This brand seems to be very pure and effective and it’s what I always re-order. Try it, take double the dose in the first week, and give it some time to get in your system. It’s great stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: LaMann

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Ill start off by saying this product has good ingredients and seems to be of high quality. But there are other products listed on amazon that have more turmeric per capsule, same great ingredients and some brands even have added ginger which adds even more benefits. Plus they cost around $18.99 vs $22.97 as of writing this review. Just search around for a product with curcumin, turmeric root, and ginger for a good price and even a coupon.
customer_reviews.author: ray

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t really noticed a difference. Also, since tumeric is hard for the body to absorb, I went several days with an upset stomach following the company’s dosage.
customer_reviews.author: mikeco3030

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY THE BEST!! BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I loved how this Tumeric helped my husband with pain! He had cancer..LUNG CANCER! I dosed him three times daily with this..he not only lived almost an entire year past what the oncology department had given us as his prognosis..he told me before he passed that he only had pain from cancer 3..yes THREE DAYS!!! Those 3 days were his last days..I am absolutely SWEARING BY THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: M.STONE

customer_reviews.title: Completely Satsified
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking Vimerson Health Turmeric Curcumin vitamins since December 2017 and have been pleased with the service and quality reviews from other users. I recommend this brand and will continue to purchase it in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: It's probably fine
customer_reviews.text: I take this daily and have so much going on with my health now - dealing with high BP. I've been told to stop taking ibuprofen or NSAIDS of any sort, so I take these when I hurt. It's just so hard to know if it is helpful - I assume it is. Eventually, the pain lightens up but I do other things too. I'll continue to take it as I know it helps relax me and with my gut issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it has black pepper and has at least 500mg of turmeric
customer_reviews.text: Have been on turmeric for a while suggest from my rheumatologist that helps not only with inflammation but also some pain. I have had severe arthritis for a long time even had both knees replaced and back surgery. So at one time in my life I was on morphine and 10mg oxytocin but have taken either in about 5 or 6 years really helps me. Just make sure what you buy has black pepper helps body to absorb turmeric better.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Works
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for some pain relief from a natural supplement. I do believe I noticed a difference after about a week of taking this supplement. I ran out and was needing pain meds until I received my next bottle. Works for me
customer_reviews.author: C. Diane Mach

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps joint stiffness and associated pain
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write reviews on products, however to share my own experience with this product may be helpful to all osteoarthritis suffers. Prior to this product use, I took Glucosamine & Chondroitin 2 x daily. Upon a suggestion from a relative I decided to give Tumeric Curcumin with Bioperine a try. I did notice a difference in joint pain and stiffness over Chondroitin Glucosamine . I say it definitely helps if taken faithfully 2 x daily. If I miss a couple days doses I absolutely feel the difference. It seems to work better for me more than Chondroitin Glucosamine did. Its definitely worth giving it a try for 30 days...
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Solid relief
customer_reviews.text: I had been hearing advertisements for another chronic pain relief product on the radio. I researched it and considered buying it until I saw the price which was outrageous. I researched the ingredients and discovered that I could purchase essentially the same ingredients separately through Amazon, Hence my purchase of your product. I bought this product in hopes of getting non narcotic relief from arthritic pain in my thumb. I take it every evening with great relief along with omega 3 capsules. Relief didn’t cone overnight but it does work. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Gringa

customer_reviews.title: Gives added boost when combined with exercise and diet
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my knee and shoulder. Not uncommon at my age! It is important to me to be able to do the things I love, which require being able to move with minimum pain. I follow an anti-inflammatory diet and exercise, but will not take meds or do surgery, if possible to avoid. This product has given me the edge I needed. After following directions faithfully for just two weeks, I am more flexible with less pain. At 63, I plan to ride my horses for quite a few more years!
customer_reviews.author: B. Howard

customer_reviews.title: check med usage before buying
customer_reviews.text: would have been a courtesy to indicate blood thinners could be an issue before I bought your product.
customer_reviews.author: No name

customer_reviews.title: Chronic pain relieved.
customer_reviews.text: Sciatica pain relief. Works very well. I had tried everything over 9-10 months: back brace, special cushions for car and desk chair, specific stretches and exercises, round the clock ibuprofen, chiropractic treatments. Pain resolved within 10 days of starting turmeric.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daily intake of important Turmeric Curcumin!
customer_reviews.text: I have been reading about a turmeric supplements. This product is very useful as it also has BioPerine (black pepper) and tumeric root in it. As a lady of 74 years old, I can use the support of body discomfort, healthy joints and brain function (just to name a few). I will continue taking this important supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: I’m tired when i wake up ):
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking (2 once a day) for 5 days now & every day since, i sleep to 9 hours & wake up tired and my body sore. I’m 20 btw.. not normal. I researched that curcumin may cause low iron absorption.. so I’m going to switch to only taking 1 twice a day or just 1. I’ll update.
customer_reviews.author: Nikol

customer_reviews.title: other joints are working way more easily.
customer_reviews.text: Took a few days to get into my system, but have noticed a lot more ease in my joints. I was having difficulty with my hips, which are chronically out of alignment, and I'm not even noticing stiffness recently. Plus, other joints are working way more easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Haines

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement
customer_reviews.text: Tumeric is an "Old World" remedy for many things. I take two capsules everyday to keep inflammation down in my joints and muscles after working out and for other health benefits. Many articles that I've read in the past also claim that it contains "Anti Cancer" properties. I find this brand to very effective.
customer_reviews.author: gracie

customer_reviews.title: They worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I am a 78 year old attorney. As time went on my signature on legal documents was becoming shaky. I thought it might be due to stiffness in the joints of my hand, so I decided to give these pills a try. After a few weeks my signature returned to normal and has stayed that way as long as I continue to take the pills.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I do not have any joint pain but have muscle stiffness from working-out every day. At first, I took 1 pill a day and did not see the result. A week ago, I started to take 2 pills a day in the mornings after breakfast and my muscles (usually my leg muscles from running and calf exercises) felt much better. The pain is almost gone. I can run every morning now. Thanks to the seller for providing a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ngan Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Helps me
customer_reviews.text: This is not my first order, maybe third or fourth. My functional med doc had me double this when I was going to have shoulder surgery and also double after. Ever hear of anyone over dosing on tumeric.? Me neither. I think this has helped for recovery. Shoulder surgery Dec. 19. . Golf, real golf, mid March. Tennis, doubles, April. I think this has helped, as well as Paleo/Keto diet and all that goes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: Sudden change in color and effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking this supplement for the past 8 months. It took a bit of time, but I definitely noticed a huge difference. I’m in my 30s and had injured my hip a few years ago, after taking this along with fish oil & vitamin d, the pain was gone. However this last batch was a different color, I noticed my hip pain return most recently when we had a run of damp, rainy weather. I’ve cancelled my auto ship for now and am going to try out another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bluelee13

customer_reviews.title: THIS VITIMAN HAS GIVEN ME MY LIFE BACK!!!
customer_reviews.text: I read all the positive reveiws and decided I had NOTHING to lose!!! I have suffered from chronic pain, fatique, osteoarthritis, and fibromyalgia for many years. So tierd of taking pain meds I wanted to try a more natural program. I HAVE TO ADMIT... I AM AMAZED AT HOW MUCH BETTER I FEEL! I TAKE 1 CAPSULE EACH MORNING WITH A SMALL BREAKFAST AND I NOW TAKE ONLY 1 PAIN PILL ADAY, WHERE I WAS TAKING UP TO 6!!!! THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR CHANGING MY LIFE.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Fowler

customer_reviews.title: It works on my pain
customer_reviews.text: I have a shoulder and knee pain and this product reduced my joint pain by 85% which is great.. The pain gradually got better. I say it took 2 weeks to notice the real difference. I highly recommend this product for joint pain. Its natrual and no medicine in it which is great. plus it has anti oxidant properties
customer_reviews.author: EVB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! What can I say other than I have been using this product for one month and I look and feel exceptionally fantastic my knees aren't swelled due to arthritis the pain has subsided emencely and even the puffiness under my eyes have shrunk and pretty much gone . I wake up feeling refreshed I will definitely tell all my friends and family about this!! Thanks a bunch I feel and look much younger now that the inflammation has gone !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Nice supplement for older folks
customer_reviews.text: Good for joint pains and back pains Bought it for my mom, she has arthritis and back pain This product helps alleviate the pain naturally and is good for your joints and other muscles especially for older people who are suffering from arthritis, diabetes and high blood pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Zain syed

customer_reviews.title: Speechless and pain free
customer_reviews.text: Tumeric Curcumin is what I purchased. I was very sceptical at first. But then I kept reading all the reviews and I thought to myself that if these people have been suffering the same pain and are feeling better, it can't hurt to try. NO pain medication has helped my chronic back pain. I started taking this supplement and I've only been taking it a few weeks, and I CAN MOVE!! and I DON'T HURT!! The testimony is so long that I can't even tell it all or I will start to cry. Try it!! That's all I can say, is TRY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Catrice Otengo

customer_reviews.title: Not for me. These capsules are huge, bigger ...
customer_reviews.text: Not for me. These capsules are huge, bigger than NY of my vitamins. You take 2/day. I tried taking them with food, and at different times and wound up with heartburn. I can't take NSAIDS and hoped these would work. I didn't contact seller and wrote review in 2016. Today I2/31/17. Seller offered a Free bottle pic something else or refund. Very kind. So keep n mind review is for product only.
customer_reviews.author: mkpstamps

customer_reviews.title: Magic pill
customer_reviews.text: Worked far better than I thought or hoped. I've only been taking one pill, not the suggested 2. I like to ease into new supplements since I don't know what my body's reaction will be. But since taking it I can get out of bed without pain and don't feel tired all the time. No other word than; Magic. At least for me. Worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!!!!💖
customer_reviews.text: I am the most sceptical person ever!! I'm telling you...I have SUFFERED from debilitating chronic neck pain/D.D.D. for years upon years, and many other joint problems. I am not lying... within 3 days for me,,,, HUGE DIFFERENCE!! I AM ALMOST PAIN FREE!!! And I only take once a day of the daily recommended 2x day. Nothing has ever worked for me.. including chiropractic care ... This is a staple for me. Have recommended to family & bought for my Momma♡
customer_reviews.author: Loly girl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for RA Pain
customer_reviews.text: I use this for Rheumatoid Arthritis pain and it works absolutely grand. My doctor recommended this to me and I have never been so thrilled. The pain is now at such a bearable level it is quite unbelievable but believe me, IT'S TRUE & WONDERFUL!!!!!!! Can't imagine going on without it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Howerton

customer_reviews.title: Turmeric Curcumin with Bioperine for Minor Aches and Pains
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this product over a year. At 50, I had started to wake up with minor aches and pains. I searched for natural remedies and discovered turmeric. It wasn’t until I missed taking it over Christmas break that I noticed the aches and pains had “returned”. I never miss now. While it is very subtle and has to build up in your system, it definitely works!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle S. Piner

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've noticed a difference in a lessening of inflammation. Since I have stomach problems, I have to be careful about taking anti-inflammatory meds. Even though this contains black pepper, I haven't had any discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: docsroc

customer_reviews.title: As good as the more expensive stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this on and off for over two years and keep coming back to it for the value. It works better than most of the similar products I have used, give it a try and see if it can help your joint pain as it does for me. I notice a difference at the end of the day, my knees and hands have more feel and function. I have tried many brands of turmeric and keep coming back to Vimerson because of the quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: Helps with my arthritis
customer_reviews.text: I have very bad arthritis in my knees. These numeric supplements along with Hemp oil have make it possible for me to go thru my day without pain.. I was using Tumeric alone and that worked 75% well, and added with Hemp its 100% better.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Just started taking this about three weeks ago and have already notice improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Blosser

customer_reviews.title: Doctor approved
customer_reviews.text: Product helps allot with the pin and needle pain I have in my hip and back. On the day of my physical, I asked my doctor if she disagreed with me taking this. She approved, and so far so good. I started out taking one since our bodies are different. Then I worked up to two. I have recommended this to my friends. With so many reviews, and good ones, I thought why not. I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

product_meta.title: Turmeric Curcumin with Bioperine, Anti-Oxidant Properties, Supports Healthy Inflammatory Response, Occasional Joint Pain Relief, 10mg of Black Pepper for Best Absorption. Enhanced Natural 60 Capsules
feature_bullets: WHY CHOOSE US: Discomfort in your joints? Vimerson Health Turmeric Curcumin may help increase your joints lubrication to assist with a smoother joint functionbility*; It helps reduce body discomfort*, helps support joints and brain function*, promotes cardiovascular health* and helps immune and digestive systems*

REAL INGREDIENTS DELIVER REAL RESULTS: Our potent Turmeric Curcumin may help relieve joint & back pain, promote joint swelling relief associated with strenuous physical activity, reduce inflammation and skin dryness, boost brain function & memory, improve digestion and blood circulation, enhance immune and nervous system;* It promotes joints, eyes, skin, hair, heart and mood*

ANTIOXIDANT PROPERTIES*: Our Turmeric Formula with BioPerine and Curcuma Longa with 95% standardized Curcuminoids is the perfect daily boost and complement to an active lifestyle; Its antioxidant properties not only may help ease joint pain, discomfort & inflammation, but also support overall health and inflammatory response;* This high quality and first-class product works great for Women, Men and Seniors

NATURAL & NON-GMO: No artificial ingredients, no gluten, no wheat, no dairy, no sugar, no soy; Our Turmeric Dietary Supplement is PROUDLY MADE IN THE U.S.A.; This product is GMP-certified to ensure the highest quality and purity

COMMON NAMES: There are many different ways people try to spell or pronounce Turmeric Curcumin; Here are some common misspellings: tumeric tuermeric tucmeric tumeri turmericcurcumin tumeroc turemic turmer termeric turneric trumeric tmeric tumerica tumuric tomeric tumerico tuneric tumetric tumericx timetric turmeic tumerik turmerik tumerick cucurmin cummin cucumin curumin cur cumin curcurmin curcuminoids curcuminoid longa bioprene pepperine peperine piperin
